content: Hello all, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/72209 has been sitting without review for a while now. @Jonas Schievink mentioned in https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/245100-t-compiler.2Fwg-prioritization.2Falerts/topic/I-prioritize.20.2376507.20.23.5Blink_section.5D.20is.20unsound.20on.20Harvard.20a.E2.80.A6 that changes to lints need to be approved by T-lang, is that true? and if so, could someone take a look at the PR?
It seems like it needs a lang FCP, right?
Either the author or someone who has time should write up a full summary of exactly what's being added
